meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or containing platinum.
meanings.sent1: The jewelry was shiny and platinic.
meanings.sent2: Her watch had a beautiful platinic finish.
meanings.sent3: The platinic ring sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The platinic paint gave the car a luxurious look.
meanings.sent5: The platinic metal was rare and valuable.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to a compound in which platinum has a higher valence than in the corresponding platinous compound.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the platinic compound carefully.
meanings.sent2: The lab results showed a clear difference between platinic and platinous compounds.
meanings.sent3: The platinic solution bubbled and fizzed unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Her experiment failed due to the unstable platinic reaction.
meanings.sent5: The platinic compound exhibited unique properties under heat.
